text: @NYGovCuomo This is a failure that can't be overlooked. But at this point, the propaganda machine has done it's damage. God help us all. #coronavirus @realDonaldTrump  @dougducey ##https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-administration-predicts-daily-virus-deaths-will-double-by-june-2020-5
